title: Mental Health First Aid: Training People to Help Others
descriptions: An innovative program trains and empowers people to not look away from those experiencing mental illness, but to listen to them, reassure them, and encourage them to get help. Most trainees of the program in New York City were still using what they had learned five years later.

image.desc: Collage of five faces with pixelated overlay, design by Dori Gordon Walker/RAND Corporation from JohnnyGreig, brusinski, alvarez, shisheng ling, and Vectorpower/Getty Images
